channel.title: Blogdown on Data Science in Education
channel.description: Recent content in Blogdown on Data Science in Education

item.title: New Website Theme!
item.description: This post has needed to be writtend for a little while, but I’ve been busy with the actual work of redesigning my website (in fact, I have a number of posts that are backlogged). This post will have a little bit of code (all of it CSS, rather than R), but mostly it’s just about my journey and things I’ve learned. Getting started with Blogdown In Yihui’s introduction to blogdown he advocates for simpler themes.
